mapper.select: select seq, id, name, subject, content, hit, category, to_char(logtime, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as logtime from(select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from community order by seq desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}

select seq, id, name, subject, content, hit, category, to_char(logtime, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as logtime from(select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from community order by hit desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
mapper.update: update community set hit=hit+1 where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from community
mapper.update: update community set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
